com.remote.remote2d.engine.art

Class Texture

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.remote.remote2d.engine.art.Texture

  • public class Texture
extends java.lang.Object
    Low-level texture holder. Acts as a direct interface between Java, Remote2D, and LWJGL to load and bind textures.
    Author:
    Flafla2

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean DEFAULT_LINEAR_SCALE
      If true, sets linear scaling to on by default.
      static boolean DEFAULT_REPEAT
      If true, sets repeat textures on by default.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Texture(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
      Loads a new texture from a BufferedImage.

      Loads a new texture from a BufferedImage.
      Texture(java.lang.String loc)
      Loads a new texture from a file.
      Texture(java.lang.String loc, boolean linearScaling, boolean repeat)
      Loads a new texture from a file.

      Binds this texture to OpenGL.

      The OpenGL ID of this texture.

      BufferedImage representation of this texture.
      long getLastBindTime()
      The last time that this texture has been bound to OpenGL.
      java.lang.String getTextureLocation()
      Location of this texture in relation to the jar file, if this Texture was loaded from a file.

      Reloads this texture in OpenGL - useful after reinitializing OpenGL.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_LINEAR_SCALE

        public static boolean DEFAULT_LINEAR_SCALE
        If true, sets linear scaling to on by default.
        See Also:
        linearScaling

      • DEFAULT_REPEAT

        public static boolean DEFAULT_REPEAT
        If true, sets repeat textures on by default.
        See Also:
        repeat

    • Constructor Detail

      • Texture

        public Texture(java.lang.String loc,
       boolean linearScaling,
       boolean repeat)
        Loads a new texture from a file.
        Parameters:
        loc - Location to any PNG file, in relation to the jar path.
        linearScaling - Whether or not to scale this Texture linearly (see linearScaling)
        repeat - Whether or not to repeat this texture (see repeat)

      • Texture

        public Texture(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
       boolean linearScaling,
       boolean repeat)
        Loads a new texture from a BufferedImage.
        Parameters:
        image - BufferedImage to use for this texture.
        linearScaling - Whether or not to scale this Texture linearly (see linearScaling)
        repeat - Whether or not to repeat this texture (see repeat)

      • Texture

        public Texture(java.lang.String loc)
        Loads a new texture from a file.
        Parameters:
        loc - Location to any PNG file, in relation to the jar path.

      • Texture

        public Texture(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
        Loads a new texture from a BufferedImage.
        Parameters:
        image - BufferedImage to use for this texture.

    • Method Detail

      • bind

        public void bind()
        Binds this texture to OpenGL. Generally this shouldn't need to be used; use Renderer instead.

      • removeTexture

        public void removeTexture()
        Removes this texture from OpenGL memory. This MUST be done before deleting this texture. Not doing so causes a memory leak because OpenGL is not garbage collected.

      • removeImage

        public void removeImage()
        Destroys this texture's BufferedImage safely.

      • getTextureLocation

        public java.lang.String getTextureLocation()
        Location of this texture in relation to the jar file, if this Texture was loaded from a file.

      • getImage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage()
        BufferedImage representation of this texture.

      • getGlId

        public int getGlId()
        The OpenGL ID of this texture.

      • reload

        public void reload()
        Reloads this texture in OpenGL - useful after reinitializing OpenGL.

      • getLastBindTime

        public long getLastBindTime()
        The last time that this texture has been bound to OpenGL.
        Returns:
        The last time that this texture has been bound to OpenGL, or -1 if it hasn't been bound.

      • isLinearScaling

        public boolean isLinearScaling()

      • setLinearScaling

        public void setLinearScaling(boolean linearScaling)

      • isRepeat

        public boolean isRepeat()

      • setRepeat

        public void setRepeat(boolean repeat)
